about:
Hello!
My name is Rivaldo Sabino.
Experienced Full Stack Engineer with 7+ years in building scalable web applications, specializing in performance optimization, user experience improvement, and cross-functional team leadership.
 Excels at improving system performance, reducing downtime by 25%, and boosting efficiency by 20%. Successfully delivered AI-driven applications that enhanced client operations and increased user retention by 15%. Notable accomplishments include integrating REST APIs that reduced data load times by 30% and optimizing workflows to improve team productivity by 35%.
 Strong communicator with a passion for adopting top software development practices.
